words.def: an acrobatic feat in which the feet roll over the head (either forward or backward) and return
A Nordic dairy product, similar to yoghurt, but using different bacteria which give a different taste and texture.
either of two fleshy folds of tissue that surround the mouth and play a role in speaking
An uncertainty, possibility, condition, doubt etc.
the ratio of the circumference to the diameter of a circle
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
